Trade/Device Name(s): BD Phoenix Automated Microbiology System - Meropenem (0.125-32 μg/mL)
Regulation Name(s): Fully Automated Short-Term Incubation Cycle Antimicrobial Susceptibility System
Specimen Type(s): Pure culture isolates of Gram-negative aerobic and facultative anaerobic bacteria
Pure culture isolates of Gram-positive bacteria
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Phoenix Automated Microbiology System panel with meropenem for antimicrobial susceptibility testing of Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro quantitative determination of antimicrobial susceptibility by minimal inhibitory concentration (MIC) of Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria isolates from pure culture, including Enterobacteriaceae, Non-Enterobacteriaceae, Staphylococcus, Enterococcus, and Streptococcus, using meropenem in Gram-negative ID/AST or AST panels.
